ARABIC: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and assembled you in whatever way He willed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Shaping you into any form He pleased?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and set you in whatever form He pleased?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He moulded you into whatever shape He willed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In whatever form He willed, He put you together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Into whatever form He pleased He constituted you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and composed thee after what form He would?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Into whatsoever form He will, He casteth thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In whatsoever form He listed He constructed thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and composed you in any form that He wished?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In whatever Form He wills, does He put thee together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In whatever form He willed, He put you together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In whatever shape He will He could surely have fashioned you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In whatever shape He willed, He assembled you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:8] assembling you in whatever (mā is a relative) form He will?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Into whatsoever form He will, He casteth thee) if He wills He makes you resemble your paternal or maternal uncles, He can make you handsome or ugly; and if He wills He can turn you into the form of an ape or swine, or the like of them.
